column2: and when we finally sat down
column3: we did everything family style.  It was pretty funny watching everyone take a small slice of the dates
column4: or a piece of the sirloin
column5: but I really think this is the way to enjoy Tapas.  Have a little bit of everything
column6: if you really like it get another dish.  To be honest
column7: we got a lot of everything so I don't remember what we ordered (ok maybe the Sangrias have something to do with my lack of memory retention).
